mapper.select: select id, title, create_by_id, create_by_name, create_time, happen_time, remark, delete_flag, update_by_id, update_by_name, update_time, reserved_key_one, reserved_key_two from myproject.day_log where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into myproject.day_log(id, title, create_by_id, create_by_name, create_time, happen_time, remark, delete_flag, update_by_id, update_by_name, update_time, reserved_key_one, reserved_key_two) values (#{id}, (#{title}, #{createById}, #{createByName}, #{createTime}, #{happenTime}, #{remark}, #{deleteFlag}, #{updateById}, #{updateByName}, #{updateTime}, #{reservedKeyOne}, #{reservedKeyTwo})
mapper.update:
update myproject.day_log
title = #{title},
create_by_id = #{createById},
create_by_name = #{createByName},
create_time = #{createTime},
happen_time = #{happenTime},
remark = #{remark},
delete_flag = #{deleteFlag},
update_by_id = #{updateById},
update_by_name = #{updateByName},
update_time = #{updateTime},
reserved_key_one = #{reservedKeyOne},
reserved_key_two = #{reservedKeyTwo},
where id = #{id}
